Market Conditions.text: Bitcoin (BTC) faced a significant decrease in value, with its current price at $101,746, reflecting a daily change of -$2,958.15.
Ethereum (ETH) also saw a drop in price today, currently at $3,204.93, which is down by $124.62 from yesterday.
Solana (SOL) continues to experience a downward trend with the current price at $236.59, a decrease of $19.39.
AI16Z witnessed a substantial decline with a -16.21% change, bringing its current price to $0.7352.

Development Updates.text: Several enhancements in the ElizaOS: The Apro plugin now supports actions such as querying current coin prices, creating agents, and verifying data.
A new plugin based on Solana web3.js V2 was built and is now operational, intended for automated LPing on Orca.
A new access token management feature has been added to the MultiversX plugin, improving overall user experience and functionalities.

Events.text: The end of Season 1 and the beginning of Season 2 was announced with the release of a new promotional video.
